statements.query: MATCH (n:AWSDNSRecord) WHERE n.lastupdated <> $UPDATE_TAG WITH n LIMIT $LIMIT_SIZE DETACH DELETE (n) return COUNT(*) as TotalCompleted
MATCH (:Ip)<-[r:DNS_POINTS_TO]-(:AWSDNSRecord) WHERE r.lastupdated <> $UPDATE_TAG WITH r LIMIT $LIMIT_SIZE DELETE (r) return COUNT(*) as TotalCompleted
MATCH (:ESDomain)<-[r:DNS_POINTS_TO]-(:DNSRecord) WHERE r.lastupdated <> $UPDATE_TAG WITH r LIMIT $LIMIT_SIZE DELETE (r) return COUNT(*) as TotalCompleted
MATCH (:NameServer)<-[r:DNS_POINTS_TO]-(:AWSDNSRecord) WHERE r.lastupdated <> $UPDATE_TAG WITH r LIMIT $LIMIT_SIZE DELETE (r) return COUNT(*) as TotalCompleted
MATCH (:EC2Instance)<-[r:DNS_POINTS_TO]-(:AWSDNSRecord) WHERE r.lastupdated <> $UPDATE_TAG WITH r LIMIT $LIMIT_SIZE DELETE (r) return COUNT(*) as TotalCompleted
MATCH (:LoadBalancer)<-[r:DNS_POINTS_TO]-(:AWSDNSRecord) WHERE r.lastupdated <> $UPDATE_TAG WITH r LIMIT $LIMIT_SIZE DELETE (r) return COUNT(*) as TotalCompleted
MATCH (:AWSDNSRecord)<-[r:DNS_POINTS_TO]-(:AWSDNSRecord) WHERE r.lastupdated <> $UPDATE_TAG WITH r LIMIT $LIMIT_SIZE DELETE (r) return COUNT(*) as TotalCompleted

name: cleanup AWS resources after all accounts are ingested
